Name: Touhou : Shooting Star | 東方流星譚
About the game: !!!!About English Translation!!!! As for English, the system messages have been translated. For conversational text, machine translation is used, so there are some unnatural points in the translation. Also, parts of the conversation may appear in a different language. Please be aware of this. About Touhou:Shooting Star -Touhou Ryuseitan As a wizard 'Marisa Kirisame', Fly in the Gensokyo! This is fun game of 'Touhou Project'! Let's play 'Danmaku'! ３D Danmaku Battle Fly and fight in the Gensokyo. 3-directyional bullets is reaching to you. Avoid bullets and shot down enemys! Spell Card Boss enemys use 'Spell Card'. Defeat their beautiful danmaku and Get ther Spell Card! Analyze and avoid characteristical bullet patten. Develop your weapon Get materials from defeated enemys and develop more strong weapon, armor, and spell card. Make your own equipments set. Each weapon has parameters and bullet. Each Armor has parameters and skills and appearance. Quest This game includes more 30 quests! Enemy boss character is more than 10 ! And every quest has sub targets. Let's try 'No damage clear','Time attack','Get all spell cards' and so on. Talk in Gensokyo There are many characters of 'Touhou Project' in the village and can talk to them. Let's talk as Marisa! There is original illust of characters of Touhou Project. Boutique You can change Marisa's cloth. Find your favorite cloth and fly in Gensokyo.
